qas.question: Which factors make Melbourne one of the moust vibrant destinations in Australia?

answers.text: The climate, waterfront location and nightlife

qas.question: For how many years in a row has Melbourne held the top position in a survey of the world's most liveable cities?
What is Australia's largest free community festival?
How many international overnight visitors came to Melbourne during the year ending March 2014?
How many domestic overnight visitors came to Melbourne during the year ending March 2014?

context: Melbourne is an international cultural centre, with cultural endeavours spanning major events and festivals, drama, musicals, comedy, music, art, architecture, literature, film and television. <a0_0>The climate, waterfront location and nightlife<a0_0/> make it one of the most vibrant destinations in Australia. For <a1_0>five<a1_0/> years in a row (as of 2015) it has held the top position in a survey by The Economist Intelligence Unit of the world's most liveable cities on the basis of a number of attributes which include its broad cultural offerings. The city celebrates a wide variety of annual cultural events and festivals of all types, including Australia's largest free community festival—<a2_0>Moomba<a2_0/>, the Melbourne International Arts Festival, Melbourne International Film Festival, Melbourne International Comedy Festival and the Melbourne Fringe Festival. The culture of the city is an important drawcard for tourists, of which <a3_0>just under two million<a3_0/> international overnight visitors and <a4_0>57.7 million<a4_0/> domestic overnight visited during the year ending March 2014.
